abstract: Brooklyn Community Services, one of seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, uses $200 to help Karen Quinones of East New York buy Christmas presents and household supplies.

headline.print_headline: A Family in Transition Rebuilds Its Connection
headline.main: A Family in Transition Rebuilds Its Connections

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Karen Quinones was overwhelmed and scrambling to take care of her four children, two of whom have pervasive developmental disorder, when she ended an unhealthy relationship.
lead_paragraph: Karen Quinones was overwhelmed and scrambling to take care of her four children, two of whom have pervasive developmental disorder, when she ended an unhealthy relationship.
